attributes.action: Remove the rules on Educational Maintenance Allowance (EMA) and allow all students to access the funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should not be means tested.
Just because your parents earn a million pounds doesn't mean they will give you any.
On National Minimum Wage, a student would have to work 34 hours a month in order to earn the equivalent of EMA. Surely these 34 hours could be put to better use by allowing our future generations to study as they wish. 

This positive discrimination and social injustice must stop.

Allow all college students aged between 16 and 18 to have access to EMA.
